findings.Liver: Fatty but without focal lesions or intrahepatic biliary duct dilatation.
findings.Pancreas: Fatty infiltration without focal lesions or peripancreatic stranding or fluid collection.
findings.Kidneys: Several small hypodense lesions in the left kidney, otherwise enhance symmetrically and excrete contrast without evidence of hydronephrosis or masses.
findings.GI Tract: Numerous diverticuli in the sigmoid colon with minimal surrounding fat stranding. No fluid collection or local free air; the remainder of the colon is non-dilated.
findings.Vascular: Moderate atherosclerotic calcifications with the aorta of normal caliber.
findings.Retroperitoneum and Abdomen: No retroperitoneal or mesenteric lymph node enlargement, ascites, free air or abdominal wall hernias.
findings.Pelvic CT: No pelvic wall or inguinal lymph node enlargement and no pelvic free fluid.
findings.Osseous Structures: No lytic or blastic lesion suspicious for malignancy.
